ctx: intros P Q x y H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros P Q x y H1 H2. unfold locally_2d in *. destruct H1 as [delta1 H1]. destruct H2 as [delta2 H2]. exists (Rmin delta1 delta2). intros u v H3 H4. specialize (H1 u v). specialize (H2 u v). rewrite Rmin_Rgt in H3, H4. destruct (Rlt_dec delta1 delta2) as [Hlt | Hnlt]. - apply H1. + eapply filter_imp; [|apply H3]. intros. apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rmin delta1 delta2). * apply Rmin_l. * auto. + eapply filter_imp; [|apply H4]. intros. apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rmin delta1 delta2). * apply Rmin_r. * auto. - apply H2. + eapply filter_imp; [|apply H3]. intros. apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rmin delta1 delta2). * apply Rmin_l. * auto. + eapply filter_imp; [|apply H4]. intros. apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rmin delta1 delta2). * apply Rmin_r. * auto.
